steps.name: Creating InWarranty Job with Create Job API
Setting up BaseURI, Content Type as Application/JSON and attaching the sensitive data filter for a role and Payload
Getting the Property Value from the config file

parameters.name: payload
parameters.value: CreateJobPayload[mst_service_location_id=0, mst_platform_id=2, mst_warrenty_status_id=1, mst_oem_id=1, customer=Customer[first_name=Kaus, last_name=Das, mobile_number=7686923755, mobile_number_alt=, email_id=kstvds@gmail.com, email_id_alt=], customer_address=CustomerAddress[flat_number=21, apartment_name=Neer, street_name=Kedar, landmark=dumdum, area=Sinthee, pincode=700030, country=India, state=WB], customer_product=CustomerProduct[dop=2026-01-29T17:54:08.407586651Z, serial_number=96548404198211, imei1=96548404198211, imei2=96548404198211, popurl=2026-01-29T17:54:08.407694351Z, product_id=1, mst_model_id=1], problems=[Problems[id=1, remark=Battery Issue]]]
